name: Anti-Tank Gun, Crewed, Disposable, Advanced (ADaTGC-12)
description: An advanced, crewed, disposable anti-tank gun. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
